question: Scenario: You are designing a login page for a website. Create a webpage that displays: Title: Login Page Heading: Login Page Form Elements: - Username: [Input Box] - Password: [Password Box] - Login Button Requirements: - Use form tag. - Use input type="text" for Username details. - Use input type="password" for Password. - Use input type="submit" or button for Login.

answer:
Login Page

Username:

Password:
sampleOutput:

Username:

Password:
description: Create a simple login form with text and password inputs.

question: Scenario: You are designing a form for booking doctor appointments that requires precise scheduling. Create a webpage that displays: Title: Doctor Appointment Form Heading: Doctor Appointment Form Form Fields: - Doctor Appointment Date and Time - Month of Birth - Week of Birth - Time of Birth Requirements: - Use form tag. - Use input type="datetime-local" for Appointment Date and Time. - Use input type="month" for Month of Birth. - Use input type="week" for Week of Birth. - Use input type="time" for Time of Birth. - Button with value 'Book Appointment'.
sampleInput: Title => Doctor Appointment Form Heading => Doctor Appointment Form Fields: - Appointment: [DateTime Local] - Month of Birth: [Month] - Week of Birth: [Week] - Time of Birth: [Time] - Button: [Book Appointment]

Doctor Appointment Form

Month of Birth:

Week of Birth:

Time of Birth:
